所有程序包的分层结构

程序包分层结构:

  • com.kale.lib.activity,
  • com.kale.lib.photo,
  • com.kale.lib.time,
  • com.kale.lib.utils,
  • com.kale.lib.views.recyclerview,
  • com.kale.lib.views.swiprefreshlayout
